reviews.text: Love food but the restaurant itself was disgusting!!!!!!  Horrible looks like floors havent been touched in years bathroom was hideous they should be ashamed of themselves every table had food on it highchairs and booster seats look 40 years old so dirty outside of garbage cans disgusting walls light switches everything is covered in dirt n grime they need to shut down for a day or 2 and do some serious deep cleaning wont come back until they do

We have been receiving delivery service here at the office for a few years.  We order pretty much the same thing each time.  However in today’s order the spinach salad was visibly different – drastically smaller.  I called to question, asking if they changed portions or were we delivered the small vs. the large.  Adamant that the portion did not change and he made no error in prep.  Normally, two of us split the salad.  For $7.99, plus delivery, plus tip - TOTAL rip off.  Horrible customer service - no attempt to resolve.  We will not be ordering from them again.

Was absolutely terrible. Got delivery, didn't receive some of the food I ordered so he just cashed in my money without giving me what I paid for. ON top of it, food quality was terrible and I was sick because of whatever that owner fed me and I had to miss work the next day because of my stomach ache.
I love the fresh salads at Pizza Pino. Very affordable. They have great spring green mixes and awesome toppings like goat cheese, roasted red peppers, cherry tomatoes and bacon crumbles. Yum!
Pizza by the slice was fine. Liked the buffalo.

Love walking into a Starbucks and smelling the fresh coffee. This location was clean and the staff friendly. Coffee was made to order and correctly made for this picky coffee drinker lol. This spot has an area for when you are wanting to socialize or break out the computer/books and do some studying while sipping on a latte. Only problem I seen was the drive through and parking area are very tight but couldn't take a star away just for that. Keep it up at this location cause my little girl and I will definitely be back for our coffee.
Always fast, friendly, and informative! Their coffee is great and their snacks are always yummy! Mobile pickup through their app is always very convenient as well!

Yummy but prices need to stop going up, they  are beyond being a very successful business that has millions of people addicted and stopping for ine of their many yummy beverages and foods almost every day like its crack, stop being greedy with the cost increase of everything, PLEASE. I want to be able to afford my coffee "crack" lol just playing, kinda. Attention there's no illegal drugs served at any Starbucks facility
... that I'm aware of!
Very friendly service. Got the order correct. Fast.
Rude, impersonal staff, slow service, dirty restrooms. The food is blah, you get better quality food at much lower prices at McDonalds or any of the other fast food chains in the area.
